text: OWSLA is a record label owned by Skrillex, Tim Smith, Kathryn Frazier and Clayton Blaha. Skrillex announced the label in August 2011. The label's first release was Porter Robinson's "Spitfire". ==Releases== * Porter Robinson - "Spitfire" * Zedd - "Shave It" * The M Machine - "Promise Me A Rose Garden / Glow" * KOAN Sound - "Funk Blaster" * Zedd - "Shave It: The Aftershave" * Skream - "Anticipate feat. Sam Frank" * Kill The Noise - "Kill Kill Kill" * Skrillex - "Bangarang" * Zedd - "Slam The Door" * Nick Thayer - "Like Boom" * Skrillex and The Doors - "Breakn' A Sweat (Zedd Remix)" * Dillon Francis - "Something, Something, Awesome" * Kill The Noise and Datsik - "Lightspeed" * OWSLA Presents: Free Treats Vol. II * Zedd - "Shotgun" * The M Machine - "Metropolis Pt. I" * Skrillex and Damian "Jr. Gong" Marley - "Make It Bun Dem" * Sub Focus - "Falling Down" feat. Kenzie May * Birdy Nam Nam - "Jaded Future" * Dream - "This Isn't House" Category:Dance music Category:2011 establishments in the United States
title: Owsla
